member.name: T:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO
member.summary: Used for Loading Game files e.g. Audio, Textures e.t.c. To Load textures, audio, shaders or c# scripts use the following methods: LoadAudio, LoadShader, LoadTexture, LoadScript. When you load data the variable will be set to null until the data is loaded into memory After they are loaded the methods will return a id for them. if you want to get your loaded data use the following methods: GetAudio, GetShader, GetTexture, GetScript

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.GetAudioClip(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an loaded audio clip
member.param: The id of the audio clip

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IsAudioLoaded(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the audio file is loaded into memory
member.param: The id of the audio file

members.member: Full file name and path for the audio file The type of audio /// Is Audio 3D out parameter, returns any errors occured when loading audio returns the id of the loaded audio

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.LoadTexture(System.String,AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IOError@)
member.summary: Loads a image into memory

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.GetTexture(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the image as a Texture2D
member.returns: Returns the image as a texture2D

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IsTextureLoaded(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the Texture is loaded

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.LoadShader(System.String,AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IOError@)
member.summary: Loads a shader from a file. WARNING: Only loads compiled shaders
member.param: file name and path to the shader
member.returns: returns the id of the shader

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.GetShader(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get shader as a string
member.returns: returns a string containing shader info

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.ShaderToMaterial(System.Int32)
member.summary: Compiles shader and convert it to material
member.returns: Returns a material that has the shader applied

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IsShaderLoaded(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the shader is loaded into memory

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.LoadScript(System.String,AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IOError@)
member.summary: Please make sure the script you load uses MonoBehaviour Interface WARNING: Only loads compiled DLL files
member.returns: Returns a material that has the shader applied

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.GetScript(System.Int32,System.String,AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IOError@)
member.summary: Gets the script that's loaded into memory
member.param: The class name of the script e.g. namespace.MyClass
Any compiler errors are displayed here

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IsScriptLoaded(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the script is loaded into memory

member.name: M:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.LoadGUI(System.String)
member.summary: Loads GUISkin WARNING: Might freeze pc while loading
member.param: Dirictory where all the GUI Textures/data is stored
member.returns: returns a GUISkin that can be used in unity

member.name: E:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.Finished
member.summary: When finished loading any data this event handler is called

member.name: T:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.IOError
member.summary: IO Errors

member.name: T:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.DataType
member.summary: All the types of data that can be loaded at runtime

member.name: T:AngryRain.Mod.AdvanceIO.EventHandler
member.summary: When finished loading any data this event handler is called

member.name: T:Encrpytion
member.summary: Encryption is used to encrypt or decrypt any data.

member.name: M:Encrpytion.Encrypt(System.String)
member.summary: gets a string and returns a encrypted string. Must be logged in to use it. If you wish to encrypt other data look at Encrypt(message,key)
member.param: string you would like to encrypt

member.name: M:Encrpytion.Decrypt(System.String)
member.summary: gets a encrypted string and returns a decrypted string. Must be logged in to use it. If you wish to decrypt other data look at Decrypt(message,key)
member.param: string you would like to decrypt

member.name: M:Encrpytion.Encrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: gets a string and returns a encrypted string.
member.param: string you would like to encrypt

member.name: M:Encrpytion.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: gets a encrypted string and returns a decrypted string.
member.param: string you would like to decrypt

member.name: M:Encrpytion.StringGenerator(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a random string

member.name: T:NetworkManager
member.summary: Network Manager Class that manages the client side of connection and sends commands to the server.

member.name: M:NetworkManager.LoggedIn
member.summary: Checks if the user is logged in or not

member.name: M:NetworkManager.GetUsername
member.summary: Gets the username of the logged in user
member.returns: Returns a username as a string

member.name: M:NetworkManager.Login(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use this method to login to the server so you can send it commands.
member.param: Username to login the server with
password to login the server with

member.name: M:NetworkManager.Logout(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Force logout

member.name: M:NetworkManager.Logout
member.summary: Logout from the server

member.name: M:NetworkManager.Register(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a user to the server
member.param: Username to register in the server
Password to set for the username

member.name: M:NetworkManager.SendCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a command to the server and returns the server responce
member.param: Comand you want to send to the server

member.name: M:NetworkManager.AddFriend(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a friend to your list of friends

member.name: M:NetworkManager.RemoveFriend(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a friend from your list of friends

member.name: M:NetworkManager.CreateLobby(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a lobby

member.name: M:NetworkManager.CreateLobby(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a lobby with a password

member.name: M:NetworkManager.RemoveLobby
member.summary: Removes the lobby that is registered with the logged in username

member.name: M:NetworkManager.SendMessage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a message to the user
member.param: User who you want to send the message

member.name: M:NetworkManager.GetMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the message and puts it in NetworkManager.messages[x].message

member.name: P:NetworkManager.serverResponce
member.summary: Contains server responce to commands.

member.name: P:NetworkManager.friends
member.summary: Contains friends list for currently logged in user

member.name: P:NetworkManager.messages
member.summary: Contains all the messages sent to, currently logged in user

member.name: T:UnityNetworkManager.Friend
member.summary: Friend Class that contains the structure for how friend object is constructed. When a friend is added a request to the friend is sent. When the request is accepted 'isRequest' variable will change to true for both the friend and the user who sent the request.

member.name: F:UnityNetworkManager.Friend.username
member.summary: Friend's Username.

member.name: F:UnityNetworkManager.Friend.isBlocked
member.summary: If the friend is blocked or not

member.name: F:UnityNetworkManager.Friend.isOnline
member.summary: If the friend is online.

member.name: F:UnityNetworkManager.Friend.isRequest
member.summary: If the friend accepted the request.

member.name: M:UnityNetworkManager.Friend.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Friend Constructor
